data.title: A Game-Changer for iPhone 14: Ailun Glass Screen Protector Delivers Unmatched Protection!
data.body:
I recently upgraded to the iPhone 14 and wanted to ensure its pristine display stayed protected. After trying out the Ailun Glass Screen Protector, I can confidently say it's a game-changer! This screen protector not only provides robust protection against scratches and daily wear and tear but also maintains the clarity and touch sensitivity of the original screen.

The installation process was a breeze, thanks to the precise cutouts and easy-to-follow instructions. I love how seamlessly it blends with my iPhone's design, giving it a sleek and professional look. The oleophobic coating is a fantastic addition, keeping fingerprints and smudges at bay, which is a huge plus for maintaining a clean and clear screen.

What sets this screen protector apart is its durability. I've accidentally dropped my phone a couple of times, and each time, the Ailun protector has absorbed the impact, leaving my actual screen unscathed. This level of protection has given me peace of mind and saved me from potential costly screen repairs.

Overall, if you want to protect your iPhone 14 while maintaining its original beauty and functionality, I highly recommend the Ailun Glass Screen Protector. It's a small investment that delivers big results, and I'm sure you'll be as impressed as I am!

data.title: Super easy to install and does protect
data.body: This is the second time I’ve bought this product because it works so well. These screen protectors have saved my phone screen multiple times. They are easy to install since everything you need is provided along with clear instructions. If you follow all the directions you end up with a bubble free, clear screen. I appreciate the fact that 3 screens and 3 complete sets of everything you need are included for a reasonable price.

data.title: Excellent screen protector
data.body: This is very easy to install and it works well. I drop my phone fairly often, so I have a strong case and this protector on it. When I dropped my phone on asphalt, one time, the screen protector cracked, but my phone was totally fine. So I bought this exact same product again, and once again, it was super easy to install. Really grateful to have had this on my phone.

data.title: Good value, right fit
data.body: Good value, they are easy to install and fit right, they tend to get scratched a little more often but for the price is definitely a good deal

data.title: 100% satisfied
data.body: These screen protectors are just perfect, exactly what i needed. Very good quality, arrived & functioned exactly as advertised, perfect fit for my Iphone 14 plus. I still cannot believe i got 3 for less than 10 bucks! The previous screen protector i had sucked. It was difficult to apply to my phone screen, pretty impossible to get it on without an air bubble or two stuck behind, got very cracked up & foggy in different areas within just 6 months or so, and was sold to me by the Verizon store (while purchasing my phone) for over $40 (for just 1 screen protector)!!!!! Which i am now pissed about! Needless to say, I’m extremely happy i found & bought these, which you just place on top of your screen & literally watch it self-attach like magic. I’m going to buy 2 more packs of 3 actually. I know if i do so, i can keep this phone for years and years without having to upgrade so often like most people sheepishly do, and that’s a really good feeling for me. Very very satisfied!

data.title: Does Its Job Well
data.body: This screen protector does its job. I bought this screen protector a little over a year ago. The screen protector comes with 3 protectors which I thought I didn’t need but it really came in handy. The first screen protector I put on my phone ended up breaking for some reason that I can’t recall and then the second one broke as well. I am on my last screen protector of the pack. These screen protectors aren’t super durable in my experience since I have never dropped my phone from any height over 1 foot (30 cm). However, I see these as essential for any iPhone 14 user. It is better to have the screen protector than to not have it. These screen protectors are also super easy to apply.

data.title: Can’t beat the price!!
data.body: My son cracked his phone on his way home from school so I desperately needed to replace it before the actual screen got damaged. This is the second time purchasing these screen protectors and I can honestly say that they have done the job in keeping the screen safe from shattering. The price is great for a set of 3. You get to have extras in case another fall happens which is a huge plus. Shipping was so fast, I was able to get it the following day after ordering. I really recommend these protectors if you’re looking for something that will keep your screen from cracking. Sturdy and easy to install. Can’t beat this price!

data.title: Good Product
data.body: One of the better screen protectors that has the least to zero air bubbles. Good value but size is not edge to to edge but acceptable. Will consider this manufacturer or seller for my new phones. Item ships quickly and nicely packaged.

data.title: Overall product is good
data.body:
I like the product, but it is not as easy to install as the video shows. We got two new iphone 15 pros. I got this screen protector because of the reviews and the installation video. But the install on both phone was not that easy. It did not completely seal done as the video shows, It left air bubbles underneath the protector. It took a lot of very hard pressing down with my thumb to get rid of the bubbles in both phones. If this had happened on only one phone, I would be OK with that as this might happen occasionally, but on both phones. I think this might be a common occurrence. So be advised. Although, I think overall, this is a good product for protecting the glass once you get it on. The install is why I gave it 3 stars.
As an edit to my previous rating, I'm increasing the rating to 4 stars. The bubbles that existed after the initial install, that I couldn't get out, have disappeared. The process of completely sealing the glass just took more time than the video showed.

data.title: Worst Screen Protector!
data.body:
I’ve been using screen protectors for my phones for over 10 years and I’ve never had one be so poor that it legitimately cracked my actual phone screen!!

Let’s start by saying I do drop my phone a decent amount because I live a pretty active lifestyle! I always keep my phone in a case and have my screen protected because I know how I am! By no means am I intentionally dropping/throwing my phone or dropping it from great heights etc.

I bought this set of 3 in June 2023 to replaced my old cracked tempered glass screen protector. I had generally bought expensive ones but this had good reviews and I wanted to try and save money because when comparing what I had it seemed almost identical!
After replacing my old screen protector with one from this set I proceeded to notice I had more trouble than ever putting it on. It didn’t seem to line up or lay flat. My phone was less than a year old and had no cracks so I assumed I was the problem. (Note: I followed all instructions and kept everything CLEAN.) I wasn’t sure why I couldn’t get at least one of the dime sized bubbles out no matter how hard I tried and eventually had to accept it.
I don’t remember exactly how long it took before I dropped my phone but the very first drop my screen protector cracked. I kept that particular screen protector on for a little while (dropped a few times after and the cracks only got worse which is when I always change protectors.) I replaced that broken screen protector for a second one in that set. The same exact thing happened with it not fitting properly! I had it out of my case etc. to put it on and there was no reason it wasn’t fitting! (I almost threw the entire screen protector out and tried a new one!) One edge had crumbled on the first screen protector so I ordered a new phone case prior to putting the second screen protector on thinking maybe that was the issue. (It wasn’t.) Within a few days I dropped my phone and the screen again cracked and after a couple months or less it also shattered and chipped just like the other one.
Eventually the fact I couldn’t see my actual phone screen because of the lifting drove me so crazy I took it off with intentions of replacing screen protector two with screen protector three of the set and while prepping my phone I realized the crack and shattering/crumbling of the glass wasn’t just the screen protector it was my actual phone screen!!

My phone NEVER ONCE fell out of my phone case etc. the edges of my phone are covered by my case and I’ve used the same type of phone case (same brand and/or style just a different size/model) for probably 8 years or more and I’ve never had an issue with my actual phone screen (not screen protector) getting cracked/damaged!

Now it’s February 2024 and I just put screen protector number three on for the time being. The funniest/weirdest part is the screen protector actually fits better now that my screen is cracked. It took me over 15 minutes to get it to line up “properly” and I have the least amount of bubbles yet but I don’t know how long that will last since I have a crack starting from the edge (where my screen crumbled from what I believe was the screen protector crumbling into my screen) all the way through the long distance of my screen to the other edge of where the screen protector stopped. (Not my screen, the screen protector because the thing doesn’t cover the entire screen like it should)

And to make things more annoying this screen protector doesn’t even cover my front camera like the original one I bought these to replace. Honestly it’s probably a blessing since my phone cracked where the screen protector was.
The front facing camera was my biggest concern when I received these screen protectors because I was so worried it would get cracked being exposed but now its proof to me that the screen protector was what damaged my screen.

So in my opinion it’s better to pay a little extra because this will definitely cost me more in the long run!
I already contacted the company but it is a little annoying Amazon doesn’t offer any help other than giving you the website of the company. I had already found that and additional info on my own before even looking into Amazon’s customer service options. Amazon didn’t even offer me a direct communication option with the company just a link to go figure it out myself and hope the company gets back to you. I’ve seen that a lot in the past with Amazon and that’s how I knew to contact the company before checking Amazon. I understand but also it’s slightly disappointing Amazon doesn’t have more options to help their customers and keep companies they partner with accountable.

data.title: It is functional
data.body: If you are just looking for a decent screen protector it is perfectly fine. However, they do not give you the tools I would think are necessary to install it. It only had a "dust remover sticker", which only helped to get some of the dust off of my screen. I was also very disappointed that the very fist time I dropped my phone (less than a week after putting the screen protector on) it cracked the screen protector. From a 3 foot fall it cracked all the way across the screen. I think this is a very cheap product and you get what you pay for.

data.title: Great Value!
data.body:
This is a fantastic set for the price. I paid $40 for some supposed specialty screen protector from the Apple Store and said protector
ended up cracking, peeling, gathering dirt, it was horrible. This packet comes with THREE protectors, excellent instructions and all the tools and gadgets you need to get the screen nice and clean in prep for adding the protector. Even if each protector only last me a month it still would cost me less to buy 4 of these (12 total since each pack has 3) and replace the protector each month than it costs me to buy that one at the Apple Store.

data.title: PERFECT FOR WHAT YOU WANT IT TO DO!
data.body: I have purchased a number of these glass covers for my phones over the years. They work like One would expect and protect the glass casing on your phone. over the years, I have dropped my phone a number of times, and while the protective glass may crack or shatter the glass on the phone remains perfectly intact. They provide an inexpensive safeguard to a more expensive accident if you drop your phone. just follow the directions and the protective glass goes on your phone and quickly without any bubbles underneath. Removal and replacement is also very simple.

data.title: Nice product, but one was broken...
data.body:
I don't know how, but one of the screen protectors was already broken when I opened the package. Amazon offered to replace it, but it would require a trip to a drop-off point (which is not easy since I live in a rural community), plus my phone would have been without protection in the meantime.

Aside from that, it works fine.
******
Addendum to my previous review: The vendor noticed my review and contacted me directly. They quickly sent me a new replacement package .

I am very pleased and revised my review from. 1-star to 5-stars.

Kudos and "THANK YOU!" to the vendor for excellent customer service (and a great product).

data.title: Love it but…
data.body:
I love my new screen. I honestly thought I would never say this, but it was very easy to install. I just removed my old screen protector, cleaned my phone screen and dried it, and lastly, placed the new screen protector on my phone slowly while applying pressure at the same time. Walla! It was done, and I am thrilled with the results.

I would recommend it to anyone! I must point out that it does not cover my front camera, so if that's what you're looking for, camera protection, this is not the product. On another side note, I ordered this delivery to come on the same day, but it came the next day; I paid extra, so don’t do same-day delivery. This is why I did not rate it 5 stars.

data.title: Additional Assured Insurance!
data.body:
These iPhone items were purchase because we couldn't use the extra ones purchased for our Samsung Galaxy phones. We are big fans of screen protectors. These have a few mm around the perimeter exposed, however, we use full cases which fill in the remaining space and adds additional impact layers between device and shock. Unfortunately modern iPhones no longer support fingerprint unlock, so we cannot attest to that function. Overall, worth the peace of mind.

Note: It would have been helpful if vendor included an alignment tool/guide to help center/compensate for the protector not completely covering the entire screen...thus the 1-star reduction.

data.title: This is my go-to screen protector
data.body:
I’ve purchased this brand so many times and I will keep coming back to it. The screen protector is so easy to put on and comes with all of the helpful little gadgets to get it on just right. The price is incredible for getting three protectors, and I have never had my actual phone screen crack with one of these on. Easy to put on, and even easier to remove when you need to change it out.

My only minor issue is that it comes with cloths to help clean the dust and finger prints off your screen prior to putting on the protector, and while it says one is “wet” and the other says “dry”, I have never actually received a packet that had a “wet” wipe. They have all been bone dry. Not detrimental to the function of the screen protector, just mildly annoying that I’m anticipating a wet wipe to clean my screen and it’s just another dry wipe

data.title: Go-to
data.body: I’ve had three different iPhones now and this is my go-to screen protector. Comes with a wet wipe, dry wipe, dust sticker, and guide stickers for each protector. The protector goes on cleanly with little pressure. Be aware that it does come with three protectors. I put this specific protector on an iPhone 13 Pro with a Spigen case. You can hardly tell it is there. The feel is just like ordinary glass and the touchscreen is still highly responsive. My iPhone is undamaged thanks to the previous screen protector of this brand that took the brunt of a fall onto asphalt.

data.title: Must Buy
data.body: Never have an issue with this protector. Ever since I bought my Pro Max this is the only protector I buy. I never have an issue with this product. It has only cracked on me twice because I dropped my phone while getting out of the car and then again on the bathroom. No damaged to my phone just the protector. Never have an issue with applying it to my phone. As long as you take your time and even it out as much as you can it’s no problem.

data.title: INVINCIBLE
data.body: this screen protector literally saved my phone, i was going up a flight of stairs and i tripped and with all my weight and pressure between the stair edge and my hand with my phone wedged between the two, i really thought i broke my phone in half but all i had to do was peel the protector off and my screen was perfectly fine! absolutely invincible, it blew my mind! 100% will be getting from now on
